Html: Can the axis of the charting package be restricted so that it's not possible to scroll beyond a certain boundary.  Basically panning shouldn't be possible unless zoomed in.  and once zoomed in it shouldn't allow panning beyond the axis shown. Also for zooming and panning is it possible to display a navigator window like photoshop for the plotter.

Hi,

Of course, 'navigator window like [in] photoshop' is a nice feature, but now it doesn't belong to our roadmap, so you can create it yourself, it is not very difficult - if you'll have questions in this part, do not hesitate to ask them.

About the first part of your question - please take a look at ViewportRestrictions collection of ChartPlotter.Viewport and at Domain property of Viewport, too.

The first allows you to add pieces of your functionality into process of determining actual Visible rectangle, and the second is a rectangle that works like a boundary for visible rectangle.

 

Best regards,

Mikhail.
